_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PANEL
name: Minecraft Autoplug
author: major@ytmajor.com
description:
AutoPlug is an automatic plugin and server updater.
This is my modification of https://github.com/ImLunaUwU/PteroPlug

- Manual RAM limit
- Defaults to latest MC server
-  Editable ZGC startup flags bfor Java 21

https://github.com/trentnbauer/PelicanEggs/

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# AutoPlug & Game Installation Script
cd /mnt/server
apt update
apt install -y curl jq wget

echo -e "Checking for directories."
mkdir -p autoplug mods plugins

echo -e "Installing AutoPlug..."
if [ ! -f AutoPlug-Client.jar ]; then
    wget -O AutoPlug-Client.jar https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Osiris-Team/AutoPlug-Releases/master/stable-builds/AutoPlug-Client.jar
else
    echo -e "AutoPlug already installed!"
fi

echo -e "Downloading configs..."
wget -O server.properties https://raw.githubusercontent.com/parkervcp/eggs/master/minecraft/java/server.properties
wget -O autoplug/general.yml https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ImLunaUwU/PteroPlug/main/general.yml
wget -O autoplug/updater.yml https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ImLunaUwU/PteroPlug/main/updater.yml
wget -O .pelicanignore https://raw.githubusercontent.com/trentnbauer/PelicanEggs/refs/heads/main/minecraft/.pelicanignore
wget -O .pteroignore https://raw.githubusercontent.com/trentnbauer/PelicanEggs/refs/heads/main/minecraft/.pelicanignore

variables.name: Server RAM
variables.description:
Actual RAM in MB for the JVM heap. Recommend setting this 512-1536MB below your container limit.
If you set this too high, your server will be killed by the RAM limit set in Pelican / Pterodactyl
